author: kfogel
msg: Make "svn log -g" output format more comprehensible, as discussed here:
Subject: Re: [Issue 3010] New - svn log -g gives inconsistent merge info
(log_entry_receiver): Make the prefix clearer and shorter.

author: lgo
msg: (merge_history_repos): When setting up the repository, do all the writes
and appends to the files binary so that different eol-styles don't cause
lines to changes which we don't want to change.
Also, don't put a new line in the commit message. On Windows, everything
that comes after it will be ignored, including the username & password

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_repos_fs_get_mergeinfo): Convert subpool to iterpool, and move
its setup.  This is all to make a later change more readable.

author: cmpilato
msg: New test file with a pair of changelist tests.
